knimeNode.name: PMML Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads models from a PMML compliant XML file.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads any model from a file. Connect the output port to a model input port of any model requiring node. Enter the source location in the configuration dialog of the node. When executed, the node reads the model from the XML description in to the specified file and provides it at its output port.
